Extensions/UIColor/PrimaryColor.html#/s:.name: color()
Extensions/UIColor/PrimaryColor.html#/s:.abstract: Returns the UIColor that corresponds with this PrimaryColor value.

Extensions/UIColor/PrimaryColor.html.name: PrimaryColor
Extensions/UIColor/PrimaryColor.html.abstract: Enumeration that contains members that represent the 3 primary colors (red, green, blue).

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC11.name: random(favoring:alpha:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC11.abstract: Creates a random UIColor. The UIColor alpha can be specified (default: 1.0).

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11PippinSwift.abstract: Operator that appends a single Element to this Array
Operator that appends the elements of an Array (of the same type) to this.

Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd11PippinSwif.name: toInt(roundRule:)
Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd11PippinSwif.abstract: Converts this Double to an Int. If this is not a whole number the returned value will be rounded using the roundRule (default: toNearestOrAwayFromZero Round to the closest allowed value; if two values are equally close, the one with greater magnitude is chosen.).

Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd11PippinSwif.name: isWholeNumber()
Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd11PippinSwif.abstract: Returns whether or not the value of this is a whole number.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE4.name: plus(_:)
Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE4.abstract: Adds amount to the current value of this.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE5.name: minus(_:)
Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE5.abstract: Subtracts amount from the current value of this.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE8.name: multiply(by:)
Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE8.abstract: Multiplies the current value of this by amount.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE6.name: divide(by:roundRule:)
Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si11PippinSwiftE6.abstract: Divides the current value of this by amount and rounds the result using FloatingPointRoundingRule (default: toNearestOrAwayFromZero) if the result of the division is not a round number.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: on(target:events:action:)
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A shortcut method that calls ‘addTarget:’ for this PipUIButton (aka UIButton) for a specific UIControlEvents

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchDownRepeat
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A repeated touch-down event action handler.; for this action handler to be called, the value of the UITouch tapCount method is greater than one.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchDragInside
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: An event action handler that is called when a finger is dragged inside the bounds of the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchDragOutside
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: An event action handler that is called when a finger is dragged just outside the bounds of the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchDragEnter
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: An event action handler that is called when a finger is dragged into the bounds of the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchDragExit
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: An event action handler that is called when a finger is dragged from within a control to outside its bounds.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchUpInside
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A touch-up event action handler that is called when the finger is inside the bounds of the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchUpOutside
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A touch-up event action handler that is called when the finger is outside the bounds of the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onTouchCancel
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A action handler that is called when a system event is canceling the current touches for the control.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onAllEvents
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A action handler that is called for any event, including a system events.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onAllEditingEvents
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A action handler that is called for any of the editing touches for UITextField objects.

Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.name: onAllTouchEvents
Classes/PipUIButton.html#/s:11PippinSwif.abstract: A action handler that is called when any touch event occures.

Classes/PipUIButton.html.name: PipUIButton
Classes/PipUIButton.html.abstract: A Subclass of UIButton that consist of properties and methods that make your iOS development workflow easier and more seamless.
